---
title: "AnnotationContext"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

The `AnnotationContext` provides additional information on how to display entities.

Entities can use `ClassId`s and `KeypointId`s to provide annotations, and
the labels and colors will be looked up in the appropriate
`AnnotationContext`. We use the *first* annotation context we find in the
path-hierarchy when searching up through the ancestors of a given entity
path.

## Fields

* class_map: list of [`ClassDescriptionMapElem`](../datatypes/class_description_map_elem.md)
